text: -  Surgery to remove as much of the tumor as possible. This is followed by radiation therapy to the brain and spinal cord. Chemotherapy is also given during and after radiation therapy.    - Surgery to remove the tumor, radiation therapy, and high-dose chemotherapy with stem cell rescue.    - A clinical trial of new combinations of radiation therapy and chemotherapy.
